import React from 'react' import {useState,useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' // import products from '../products' const ProductsScreen = () => { const [product,setProduct]=useState({}); const { id:productId }=useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ const fetchProduct=async()=>{ // const {data}=await axios.get(`/api/product/${productId}`); const response=await axios.get(`/api/product/${productId}`); setProduct(data); } fetchProduct(); },[productId]) return ( <> Go Back
